title: Evaluation of Continuous Glucose Monitoring in People with Type 1 Diabetes
eligibility: Ages 18-70, diagnosed with Type 1 diabetes for at least 1 year, currently using insulin

title: Novel Antihypertensive Medication Trial
eligibility: Ages 30-75, systolic blood pressure ≥140 mmHg or diastolic blood pressure ≥90 mmHg

title: Targeted Therapy for Severe Asthma
eligibility: Ages 12-75, diagnosis of severe asthma, inadequate control with current therapy

title: Early Intervention in Alzheimer's Disease
intervention: Cognitive Training Program and Anti-amyloid Therapy
eligibility: Ages 55-85, early-stage Alzheimer's diagnosis, MMSE score 20-26

title: Statin Alternative for Coronary Artery Disease
Lifestyle Intervention for Type 2 Diabetes Prevention
